children.text: Hosted prime-time and weekend radio shows, building a strong listener base with storytelling, humor, and interactive formats.

responsibilities: Host daily radio shows and special festival segments
Coordinate with production for on-air games and contests
Anchor on-ground radio events and brand activations
achievements: Nominated for New York Radio Forum Awards

children.text: Managed end-to-end show flow, scripting, and on-air content while experimenting with interactive and experiential formats.

responsibilities: Design show concepts and audience interaction formats
Collaborate with brands for sponsored segments
achievements: Consistently rated among top shows in the city
Recognized for innovative on-air audience engagement

children.text: Designing and delivering high-energy team building experiences for corporates, colleges, and communities.

responsibilities: Plan and host team-building games & experiences
Consult HR and leadership teams on engagement goals
Customize formats for remote, hybrid, and in-person events
achievements: Built repeat relationships with multiple corporate clients
